description: The `Media` component is used to display images, iframes, ...media. Who'da thunk?

className.description: An optional className to apply to the card media component.

forceAspect.description: Boolean if the aspect ratio should be forced.

expandable.description:
Boolean if this component should be expandable when there is a `CardExpander`
above it in the `Card`.

component.description: The component to render the card media as.

description:
The `MediaOverlay` component is just a very simple wrapper that adds the
`.md-media-overlay` class name to a div. The overlay will be positioned
at the bottom of the `Media` by default.

style.description: An optional style to apply to the overlay.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the overlay.

children.description:
Any children to display in the overlay. This is _normally_ a `CardTitle` component
or some buttons.

component.description: The component to be rendered as.
